data.title: Obituaries – Eagleson Funeral Home
data.text:
Joseph Stevens

Stevens, Joseph passed away at the Southampton Hospital on Wednesday August 21, 2024. Joseph Vincent Stevens of Saugeen First Nation at the age of 89. Predeceased by his parents Melvin & Annie Stevens. Uncle Jo will be sadly missed and fondly remembered by his special niece Trudy Jacobs, great nephew Rich Jacobs, great, great nieces […]

View Full Obituary

Joshua Johnson

Johnson, Joshua passed away unexpectedly after an accident on Thursday August 15, 2024. Joshua Ethan Justice Johnson from Saugeen First Nation at the age of 21. He will be extremely missed by his mother, Leesa Johnson ‘Mama Bear’, his dad, Kenneth Ritchie, siblings, Collin (Mandy Lyn), Kenny (Karla), Kristen, Bill, Erik, Tehya, Jayna, Miranda, and […]

View Full Obituary

David O’Reilly

It is with deep sadness that we announce the death of David Allan O’Reilly of Toronto on July 29th at the age of 65. He died peacefully in his sleep at his partner’s home in Colombia. David was born on December 19, 1958, and raised in Hamilton. He went on to study tourism at LaSalle […]

View Full Obituary

Darlene Brown

Brown, Darlene, passed away unexpectedly with her husband Elmer by her side, on Tuesday, July 31, 2024 at the age of 71. Loving mother to Lori Ann Brown and the late Allan Brown (2021). Proud grandma of Michaela Brown. Predeceased by her parents Sam and Allie Mitchell and Elmer’s parents Nephi and Rotha Brown. A […]
